code: import axios from'axios';const baseURL='https://argupedia.onrender.com/argumentSchemas';export const fetchArgumentSchemas=()=>axios.get(baseURL);export const createActionSchema=newActionSchema=>axios.post("".concat(baseURL,"/action"),newActionSchema);export const createExpertOpinionSchema=newExpertOpinionSchema=>axios.post("".concat(baseURL,"/expert-opinion"),newExpertOpinionSchema);export const createPositionToKnowSchema=newPositionToKnowSchema=>axios.post("".concat(baseURL,"/position-to-know"),newPositionToKnowSchema);export const updateIsAttackedBy=(id,attackerId)=>axios.post("".concat(baseURL,"/updateIsAttackedBy"),{id,attackerId});
